named-query.name: Country.findByCapital
named-query.query: select c from Country c where c.capital like concat('%', :capital, '%') order by c.capital

named-native-query.name: Country.findByMinPopulationAsRecord
named-native-query.query: SELECT name, id FROM countries WHERE population >:minPopulation ORDER BY population

named-native-query.name: Country.findByMinPopulation
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM countries WHERE population >:minPopulation ORDER BY population
